title: The 10k Bet! Miguel and John Wager it All!
content:
Miguel thinks The Radavist’s YouTube can hit 10,000 subscribers by December 31st, 2024. John is skeptical. So, to up the ante, the two placed a bet. It’s all on the line…

Please, if you enjoy these videos, hit the subscribe button below! Save Miguel’s mustache!

 

 

The post The 10k Bet! Miguel and John Wager it All! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
